list_definition.definition: to ask (a person) politely to come (eg to one’s house, to a party etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They have invited us to dinner tomorrow.

list_definition.definition: to ask (a person) politely to do something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was invited to speak at the meeting.

list_definition.definition: to ask for (another person’s suggestions etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He invited proposals from members of the society.
